title: Can't launch the game.
body:
So whenever I pull up League and press "Launch" nothing happens, I've already tried plenty of things (doing a repair, deleting files, uninstalling and reinstalling) and nothing is helping. 
I've waited a solid 10 minutes after pressing it and nothing comes up. I've opened task manager and noticed that everything related to league just closes after I press it to.
 Any advice?

replies.body: If nothing is happening after pressing Launch, then it's likely that a pc setting is blocking the client from opening.  You'll want to go through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  I hope that helps!

Tried everything recommended and nothing.

Edit: Seems the problem is coming from the new Client. I deleted any files associated with new client and launched Legacy client and it's working now. I'm not sure what the issue was but the new client definitely needs a lot of work.

Manually going in and deleting those files might end up causing you errors if you try and play a game, because they share game files.  You might want to run a repair and run the legacy client manually.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

If you have any feedback, let the [client devs ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)know at the client discussion boards.  Thanks for testing!

I just want to use the legacy client and not even running from lol.launcher is working. I open lol.launcher and click launch and nothing happens. I check my task manager and see "LoLPatcher.exe, LoLClient.exe, and LoLLauncer.exe" but no League windows are open. I've reinstalled the game twice and repaired multiple times. I've also set "leagueClientOptIn = no and leagueClientOptIn = yes" and neither of those worked. 

I'm seriously at a loss here and don't know what to do. Usually one of these fixes would work but it's just not working. I really prefer the legacy client to the new client, and clicking "Launch Legacy Client" also leads to nothing happening except for it showing up in my task manager.

It looks like Targons Blade helped you out with this, though it sucks to hear that the issue persists.  Hit us up in a #ticket os our tech team can help you out individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)  as well to obtain some logs and attach it to your ticket.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
